high_descs: Move to the desk on the other side of the coffee table
Pick up the laptop from the desk
Move to the lamp to the left of the desk
Turn on the lamp
tasks.task_desc: Inspect a laptop with a tall lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the end of the couch, then left again to walk around the table and turn to the TV on your right.
Pick up the lap top on the entertainment stand below the TV.
Turn to your left and walk to the lamp in the right corner of the room.
Turn on the lamp in the right corner of the room.
tasks.task_desc: Turn on the lamp in the right corner of the room while holding a lap top.

high_descs: Turn left towards the wall, then turn left again towards the TV, close the console on the TV stand.
Take the console from the TV stand.
Turn left towards the wall near the window, then turn right towards the floor lamp. Put the console close to the floor lamp.
Turn on the floor lamp using the console as a remote control.
tasks.task_desc: Turn on the floor lamp using the console as a remote control.

high_descs: Walk straight until the end of the gray couch and face the books on the couch.
Pick up the remote control from the couch.
Turn around and face the table in front of the couch.
Put the remote control near the plant on top of the table
Walk slightly to the right, go straight and turn left to go to the TV.
Pick up another remote control from the TV cabinet.
Turn around, walk straight and turn right to go back to the table.
Put the remote control on top of the table
tasks.task_desc: Put 2 remote controls on the table in front of the couch.

high_descs: Walk to the white loveseat.
Grab the remote from the loveseat.
Walk to the couch in front of the box.
Place the remote inside the box.
Grab the box with the remote in it.
Walk to the white loveseat again.
Place the box on the loveseat.
tasks.task_desc: Put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.

high_descs: Turn to the right and find the chair on the left.
Pick up the remote from the chair.
Carry the remote and take a few steps to the left to the couch.
Place the remote in the box on the couch.
Pick up the box from the couch.
Carry the box a few steps to the right to go back to the chair.
Place the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Place a remote in a box and move them to the chair.

high_descs: Walk forward, then hang a right and walk across the room, turn left and walk up to the chair.
Pick up the remote off of the seat of the chair.
Turn left and walk forward, then turn right to face the blue couch.
Put the remote in the cardboard box that is on the seat of the couch.
Pick up the cardboard box with the remote in it.
Walk back over to the chair.
Put the cardboard box with the remote in it on the seat of the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cardboard box with a remote in it on a chair.

high_descs: Walk forward, turn left, walk forward towards the wall, turn right to face the TV stand.
Pick up the watch from the TV stand.
Turn around to face the standing lamp in the corner.
Hold the watch up and turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Turn the floor lamp on while holding a watch.

high_descs: Walk ahead and then hang left to the far end of the TV stand.
Pick up the watch on the TV stand.
Turn around and walk to the lamp.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a watch by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn left, walk to the other side of the TV cabinet
Grab the watch on the cabinet
Turn around to the floor lamp
Turn on the floor lamp
tasks.task_desc: Grab the watch from the TV cabinet, turn on the floor lamp

high_descs: Turn right and move to the book on the chair.
Pick up the book on the chair.
Turn left and bring the book to the blue couch.
Put the book on the blue couch to the left of the computer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on the blue couch.

high_descs: turn right to the sofa
grab the book on the sofa
turn left, walk to the grey sofa on the right
put the book down on the sofa by the computer
tasks.task_desc: move the book from the white sofa to the grey sofa

high_descs: Turn around to face the chair.
Pick up the book on the chair.
Move to the left to face the middle of the couch.
Put the book on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Move the book from the chair to the couch.

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the striped chair.
Pick the book up from the chair.
Go left and turn to the right to face the couch.
Put the book on the couch to the left of the computer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on a couch.

high_descs: walk forward a couple steps, stop to face the chair on the right
pick up the book that is on the chair
turn left, walk forward, stop to face the couch on the right
put the book on the couch
tasks.task_desc: move a book from the chair to the couch

high_descs: Turn to the right to find the stripped chair.
Pick up the book from the chair.
Take the book, turn to the left and find the blue couch.
Place the book on the couch, to the left of the laptop.
tasks.task_desc: Move a book from the chair to the couch.

high_descs: walk forward, turn left, take a few steps, turn right to face TV stand
pick up the keys that are on the TV stand
turn left, walk across to wall, turn right, walk to lamp in the corner, hold keys up
turn the lamp on
tasks.task_desc: examine the keys with the lamp

high_descs: Move to the TV stand on the left.
Pick up the keys on the TV stand.
Turn right, move to the tall lamp on the floor, in the corner.
Turn on the tall lamp on the floor.
tasks.task_desc: Examine the keys by the light of the tall lamp.

high_descs: Move forward, then left and face the tv to your right.
Grab the keys from the tv stand in front of you.
Turn left then face the lamp on your right.
Turn on the lamp in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Turn on a lamp and take your keys.

high_descs: Turn around, turn left at the striped chair, turn right and face the left side of the couch.
Pick up the keys from the front edge of the couch.
Turn right, turn right at the curtains, walk to the lamp and look up at it.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk forward to the armchair, then turn left and walk to the blue sofa.
Pick up the key chain on the sofa near the purple pillow.
Turn right and walk forward to the wall, then turn right and walk to the lamp in the corner.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Examine a key chain by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Turn around completely, walk up to the striped chair, make a left, and walk over to the far left couch cushion.
Pick up the set of keys that are on the couch cushion.
Turn to the right, walk up to the curtains, then turn right and walk up to the floor lamp.
Turn on the floor lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Examine a set of keys using the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Walk to the coffee table then take a step to your left and walk to the coffee table then turn right to face it.
Pick up the credit card farthest to the right.
Turn left and walk to the curtains and then turn left and walk to the chair.
Put the credit card near the edge of the cushion below the remote.
tasks.task_desc: Put a credit card on the chair.

high_descs: Walk to the coffee table.
Pick up the furthest credit card to the right on the coffee table.
Turn around and walk to the striped armchair.
Set the credit card down on the seat of the striped armchair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a credit card from the coffee table to the striped armchair.

high_descs: Walk to the coffee table on the cards' side.
Grab the right card from the table.
Walk to the white chair on your left.
Place the card on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a card from the table to the chair.
